website_summaries.verdict: Basic but attractive Bluetooth beanie that provides decent sound quality and reliable battery life.
pros: Comfortable and soft knitted cap provides a nice fit that works well for numerous outdoor activities
Wireless built-in headphones deliver excellent sound quality
Washable material once you remove the electronics
Battery can last up to 8 hrs per charge
cons: Interference can result in crackling noises

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this beanie for about a week now. I wear when I go to classes or on my way to the gym. The sound quality is pretty good, I am not an audiophile. The hat itself is pretty comfortable; however, I wish there was more room to adjust the speakers. I do have a pretty big head lol. Check out the video for a more in depth review!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Potts

customer_reviews.title: This bluetooth hat works great
customer_reviews.text: So after reviewing this bluetooth hat I really like it i received a call on it I was able to talk and hear I also bluetooth my music from my phone and it played great no problems I let my son uses it to see if it would connect with his PlayStation to talk online with friends it did I like this hat is different also would be great for a jogger or maybe the gym as well it does come with a charger to charge the hat it also comes with directions plus you can remove the bluetooth devices And wash the hat and place the devices back when done its a nice hat
customer_reviews.author: LaRay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband, and he is obsessed with it. The sound quality is amazing, and he says it is extremely comfortable! He has recommended it to many people already!
customer_reviews.author: Karri Hoefling

customer_reviews.title: Works well and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: I've got a small head. The cap is a little big on me, but it works. The sound quality is good, but not perfect. It's a little muffled since it has to come through the padding of the cap. The cap is thin, but it stays warm even in sub-freezing temperatures. Being a little big on me, it looks a little funny, especially with the brown leather "ears." But the extra air and leather padding helps trap heat and keeps me warmer, while also protecting the speakers from weather. Overall, I'd recommend this product with a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a music lover who always wears beanies in the winter (he's bald) and I worried it would turn out to be a cheap piece of crap! Well-- it's not. I got great feedback- said it paired up via Bluetooth instantly and works great! Ideal for situations where you want to listen or be hands-free, but don't want to be totally cut off like wearing headphones or earbuds. Great little gift for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Xenia

customer_reviews.title: Decently surprised
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this on a whim, the idea sounded cool, needed a new hat and the price was right. I wasn't expecting much, but I was actually surprised. First of all, just as a hat alone, it's very comfortable and keeps my head pretty warm, does what a hat should do. Second of all, the speakers in the hat actually sound very good, they're also very discreet, making it great to use at work, school or if your wife is nagging you. My only complaint is that it's a little big and the speakers don't fit directly over my ears sometimes, however for the price it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Huber

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, warm, and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Sounds great. I got this for my son so he can stay warm and rock out to music or watch videos. He loves them. Very fashionable and warm. A+!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: What a fun purchase for Christmas. Great for my family gift exchange. Sound quality is very good. No earbuds to go into your cold ears. Built in headphones are just like the old leather padded kind that cover your ears, but covered with the soft hat fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Probably return and get the other brand again, Seems like its for LEFTIES
customer_reviews.text: The sound and price are great but this seems like its made for left handed people with the buttons and main speaker on the left and you can't turn it the other way and it gets uncomfortable after a few minutes I might just return it and get the other brand
customer_reviews.author: mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Cool hat
customer_reviews.text: Got it for hubby as a Christmas gift, he loved it. But so did our kids. Now I have to buy a few more. The hat fit perfect. The speaker part is in a good part. No shifting around & sound isn't blurry at all. We use it in the gym & at work delivering pkgs. Great invention. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tekisha West

customer_reviews.title: So cool.....
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea, and the sound quality is so much better than I expected it would be. Whoever came up with this idea was a genius. The hat is toasty warm and of good quality.....I ended up buying a second hat for my other son as I liked this hat so much.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hat
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed testing out this hat. It is amazing to have music in you hat. It works great as long as you align the speakers with your ears. It has adequate sound. Pairing the hat was easy. It has a standard micro usb port which is the same as many phones. My kids liked them too.
customer_reviews.author: T Will

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for riding hands free. The controls are easy to use. I like that I can change songs and volume using the same button. Pretty warm also, but not too hot under a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING! Worked right out of the package, paired right away, and the sound is awesome. I only got to listen to music for a few minutes before my grandson tried it and announced that it belongs to him! He loves it! Super easy for him to use while playing games on his iPad. No wires to get tangled up in, no hard headphones hurting his head, and he thinks he looks cool! My 13 daughter tried it too and has put it at the top of her Christmas list so it looks like I’ll be buying at least 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney geddings

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have high expectations but this beanie is really cool! The speakers in the beanie are actually loud but don’t project sound out so much so they’re safe to listen to in public spaces. They work with anything that you have that has Bluetooth and can even be used as a mic. This beanie would make a great stocking stuffer for the holidays. It’s a nice little odd item
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: The first beanie I ordered had some sound quality issues (extreme sound clipping) however the seller sent a free replacement the same day. I've been testing it for a few hours today and I haven't found any issues even at the maximum volume. The sound quality is definitely worth its price. The knitting feels nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphone didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The right headphone did not work. I have the down grader and it is awesome this upgrade did not work I was disappointed once I took it out the bag to find out the right side would not turn on I want a new one
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good beanie for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beanie for work since we are not aloud to have earbuds in our ear for safety reasons. The speakers are not the best but it works for music. The only thing that I do not like is that every time these connect to a device the volume is at full blast. So once you hit play it hurts your ears until you can turn them down.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: The hat is soft and a normal size but very stretchy. It bluetoothed quickly to my Apple products. The sound is loud and clear and I get as almost much reception (distance wise) as I do from my wireless Apple earbuds (say 15 foot instead of 20). My son hasn’t gotten really used to wearing a hat and he doesn’t work out but this hat fits the purpose because ear buds kind of bother him, and he loves his music as any 12 year old would. The size is more of an adult size so it basically fits a teen like they wear their hats, kind of on the slouchy side.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love this beanie! I use it so I can listen to podcasts discreetly at work. It fits great, and its pretty much the perfect size. You can charge it for about an hour and get about 3 hours of battery life from it. The sound is not going to blow you away. It sounds about the same as a pair of apple earbuds. If you turn the volume up loud enough, then people next to you might be able to hear it. Overall I love this product and I would buy another one if I needed too.
customer_reviews.author: Average customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's a genius idea to make a bennie with bluetooth headphones ! Though I won't say the bluetooth headphones is comparable to the brand ones, but it's very convenient in the cold days and looks seamless! Overall, it does a good job as headsets, making loud sound and lasting a few hours. I don't expect a better product at this price to provide more. Headset and the bennie can be separated for wash purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Fujiang

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bluetooth skully.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 yr old son. He loves it. The volume doesn't crank as loud as he likes, which is good so he won't go deaf. It's loud enough that I can here and make out what he's listening too. The fit is good, but the size looks a touch bulky on young teens. The charger port is easily accessible and plugs in nicely. The headset can be removed for washing. Bluetooth pairing was simple as expected. All in all a solid setup I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Verbal

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fabric but great audio
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how they said it would with bluetooth connection to phone and a soft, warm fabric. The speakers are right on the edge of the hat so wearing the hat can be a little odd with a ton of extra fabric at the top of your head. The speakers work great if you're listening to music but if you use it to talk to anyone hands free you sound very distant. Overall a great product to be used when shoveling the drive or working outside but not something to totally replace a traditional hands free mic.
customer_reviews.author: Tonja

customer_reviews.title: For the cold weather athletes and workers.
customer_reviews.text: Like a bit of music when venturing out is the cold? This hat may be you answer. No ear buds under hats, no loud music to disturb others. Slip on, adjust speaker position, and go. Speakers can be removed for washing. Should fit most, large heads or smaller heads ear pieces may not be in perfect position but still comfortable and usable. They do have some wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Babebbj

customer_reviews.title: Responsive company -- excellent service
customer_reviews.text: My earlier review noted that a headphone in this beanie slipped out. The company promptly contacted me, concerned about the unusual defect, and volunteered a replacement beanie. I received this right away and am frankly amazed and delighted at the care and concern shown by the company. Clearly, this is a company that stands behind its products. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bookwine

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric bad everything else
customer_reviews.text: Style is really cool, fabric is really nice for a beanie hat. The ear parts are very bulk, heavy and almost uncomfortable. Packing is good but absolutely NOT premium as mentioned in description. Absolutely no instructions included for pairing. Distance away from media device is NOT far at all. Maybe 20ft and it starts getting choppy connection Phone call talk back is not very clear on the person calling from mobile device. Overall good product, not premium On back back of package it has the contact for fullight tech covered up with a sticker but above says to contact them before leaving feedback or negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Lykins

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Updated review 1/24/2020 The seller contacted me to apologize and offered a full refund. They have since switched to another manufacturer with better quality. I must say, I am now very impressed with this company. They actually read their reviews and care.. I will give them another shot.. good customer service is sometimes hard to come by. Old review- Feels very cheap. Sound goes in and out, does not stay charged. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Cure for Senior TV blasting..thank heavens!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 84 yrs old mom with poor hearing for christmas so TV in her room wouldn't deafen me anymore. Took a while for her to learn to turn on and I occasionally have to help her but it's well worth it. Ended up buying a second one a month later for her to rotate as charge lasts only abt 4 hrs. Much cheaper than the expensive hearing aids she has but doesn't wear. And other than occasionally having to locate channels for her, the TV is much less irritating to me.
customer_reviews.author: review4 2

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear at work. He works in construction and was originally searching around for some blue tooth earphones. Considering that he wears a knit cap for work, this was the perfect solution. The price is only around $20. Can't beat it. He can even answer his phone by pressing a button on his hat. We plan to buy this for all the men in his family for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sue V Life Coach

customer_reviews.title: Good idea that works well
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little clunky upon taking out of package, but it fit fine and worked great when worn. The charge port was a little hard to get to, but it charged quickly and easily. Sound was excellent and it was great to listen to music while walking the dog on a cold breezy day. I have been using it for a few days now and I really quite like it and would recommend it to anyone looking for a Bluetooth headset to use in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: One Month and they are Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for about a month, sound quality was initially great. Now speakers are crackling and barely working. I’ve been shopping for some work headphones for a year now...where is the quality at? Everything starts out great and then a month later is garbage. This product is not worth until they make the speaker last longer than a month!
customer_reviews.author: BrianVincent

customer_reviews.title: Really great !  phone , music ..
customer_reviews.text: It's funny I can't believe that I use this all the time. I walk around the house with it and talk on it as a phone..!! it has a very good sound to it . is very convenient, it also holds a charge pretty long.... Warm hat .. I really actually love this hat... I highly recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Celestial gg

customer_reviews.title: Never knew such option exists
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for Beanie Hat for this winter and stumbled upon this item which has wireless speakers. I immediately wanted to try it. The hat is very nice, soft and very comfortable to wear. The speakers are easy to pair with my android phone and sounded ok. I've been wearing it everyday during evening walks while listening to the music. I'm sure I look cool in it and with the music coming out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kishore Balla

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband since he works outside a lot and needs to be on his phone. He loves it! He can keep his ears/head warm and still talk on the phone or listen to music instead of having to take off his hat or push it up to hear. He said it has great sound and was easy to use. It was a great Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Useless 😡
customer_reviews.text: This product was absolutely terrible. The sound was EXTEMELLY static and only played thru one ear until the next day, and it didn't play at all. It was difficult to connect, took three or four trys, let alone didn't even fit my head. I saw all the other reviews, and I thought this was gonna be a win, but instead im very disappointed. Waste of money and time (Btw, I'm not a bot. Real person)
customer_reviews.author: Theron Roy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it run big or I have a very small head. Sound is just on one side so that’s my bad. Was ok. Glad I only paid a lower price off season.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, but could be a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, but the fit is cumbersome. The hat is pretty big, so I can’t run with it. It’s ok for walking. I wish it was tighter, and the speakers were a more comfortable shape. (They are just bulky squares in the fabric over where they assume your ears are.)
customer_reviews.author: S Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Ok gift to yourself if you just want to try a cheap one before you get a more expensive set
customer_reviews.text: Average, but definitely wouldn’t want to gift as a stand alone gift. Wish the hat & sound were better quality & the ear buds actually matched where your ears are positioned.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this beanie!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beanie. I wear it to bed because my wife snores and this works amazing to block her snoring and I can listen to my music. Def going to buy an other one! Wish they made a sleep mask with Bluetooth speakers to help block the sun. One thing I didn't like is when the battery gets low it keeps talking " battery is low" over an over But usually by then it's time for me to get up anyways.
customer_reviews.author: George Apessos jr

customer_reviews.title: Second year I bought these for my Sons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year and all my sons friend's wanted to know where to get them! They really like the warm cap covering with the Bluetooth capabilities! Bought new ones this year and now they have a spare! Also, the cost for these is in range with the quality of the cap material plus the added technology!
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my mom for when she is stocking the freezer at work but it wouldn't work in there. My dad took it for when he is working on the roofs and he said it works very well for him in the cold
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a handful of times for listening to music when it was a bit colder in early winter. It definitely worked as described. The beanie itself is very soft inside as well. It does keep you warm. It is easy to remove the speakers and wash the beanie. I recommend it if it’s something you’re interested in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for son who does a lot of sports and athletics. He loved these! This way he doesn't have to wear ear buds or headphones while practicing or working out in the cooler weather. Sound quality is pretty good, especially for the price of these. We have not tried to wash this. So will update after a wash to see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ski cap with speakers on each side of cap
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my son. He likes it He said it's easy to use. Better than wearing the headphones. He's happy so I'm happy too.not sure but I think he had to charge it first before he used it for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good. Microphone is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I'm keeping it because I expected the microphone to be sub-par, but they shouldn't be proud of that fact. It's comfortable, easy to learn, and has an OK little instruction sheet. The sounds is definitely good enough for the price, but it's advertised as having a microphone. When I use it, I have to shout for the other to party, even if I'm in a studio. I think they should simply not advertise the mic because why get people's hopes up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Campbell

customer_reviews.title: “Refund?”
customer_reviews.text: The hat was stretched out, WAY too big for the men in our in our house(who are not petite). When I returned I requested my refund same way as I paid for it but they would only give me a gift card and there is a delay getting it. I shop Amazon for ease of use and how quickly they handle things...a gift card is slowing everything down, not how I paid and adding a step when I make a new purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My first beanie stopped working after two months. When I contacted customer service, they offered to send me another one. What I didn’t know is that they were going to charge me for it! The sound quality is poor in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun new item for a teenager!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for two teenage grandsons and they both seemed to like it and were very intrigued as they had not seen one like it before. Hope they get many hours of enjoyment out of it plus it will keep their head warm this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life?!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beanie I honestly never had any idea this existed til my son got one for Christmas...this one is more my style and definitely better quality than the one he has. sound is amazing battery seems to last quite awhile the only thing I noticed is the distance isn’t very far before it cuts out but I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 21 year old son loves this hat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a gift for Christmas for a snowboarder son. He wears this hat all the time though, he really likes it. Plays music for a few hours and he likes that he can hear other things from the other ear. Won't last all day but it seems to be good for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Swiernik

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have to push hard on music controls to work them, painful on your ear. I currently have another brand that costs the same and does not have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Left ear speaker is larger than right ear
customer_reviews.text: You have a disproportionate look when your left ear piece is double the size of the right ear. I guess one needs to be larger for the charging plug-in. But make them the same size so you don't look like you have a growth one side of your head.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Joffe

customer_reviews.title: Goofy
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are too bulky. The seller should show several different photo angles of the product being worn.
customer_reviews.author: 2004 Duramax....

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for guys
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friend's bday and he loves it! He was actually thinking of getting one but I beat him to it. Not sure how the beanie worked out for him but know he couldn't wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Cat2daTrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who walk outside in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Don't be discouraged if it's challenging the first few time to reinsert the earpieces into the holders. Be patient, they do go back in. This is great for walking in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound from a Beanie!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this upgraded beanie is FANTASTIC. Superb sound; comfy fit; auto bluetooth connection to my iPhone 11 ( no signal drops) and dynamic sound. I was skeptical about a beanie, have always owned Bose and Beats and other high end wired as well as wireless headphones. But these have made me a believer. Great sound without the hassle of equipment dangling from my ears, and fashionable as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: OmegaPoseidon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even know these existed. But super fun and Cool gift ! Kids were excited !
customer_reviews.text: Super cool gift, both kids loved it ! Something they didn't expect, they didn't even know they existed, totally happy I bought them for them, very neat ! Wish I had one now for me and the wife !
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Best product you didn’t know you needed but you do!!
customer_reviews.text: Family owns a company with a walk-in cooler and this beanie with built in bluetooth has been amazing for spending time in there to restock the cooler. The price is cheap enough that I’m going to buy another one to leave in my car for the winter. Great product! Wish I would’ve thought of it!
customer_reviews.author: James Dearth

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! I love it. Just received it today so I cannot speak to the longevity. Charged the battery for three hours before use. Wearing it now. Great sound. Easy paring. Buttons work as they should. Have not used it for phone calls yet. Not sure that I would. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable sound and plenty of warmth.
customer_reviews.text: I wear beanies throughout the winter or cold months since I have no hair. I usually wear my headphones when I go out walking over whatever hat I’m wearing. Now with this new beanie my head stays warm and I don’t have to bring my large set of headphones. The sound quality is pretty good. Definitely not high quality but I didn’t expect that. I would recommend this product for any snow sports enthusiasts or outdoors people.
customer_reviews.author: kevin j kearney

customer_reviews.title: Good starting point
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend working out in the hat due to the fact it becomes itchy when you start to sweat. Sound quality is good but could be improved. Great for taking the dogs for a walk when it's chilly outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Young

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother who works outside all day. He loved it! Called him to test the quality and he sounded very clear and said he could hear me well. Great gift for those working in the cold that need hands free music or phone access.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A new awakening!
customer_reviews.text: JOe really liked this in the winter time....quality was good...didn't hold speakers to your head good enough..but once it did...Quality was incredible! I must say!
customer_reviews.author: Penney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect gift for my husband to still use the phone and listen to music while being under the vehicles in the shop hands free.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnnaAshley

customer_reviews.title: Great but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this because I could take it to work and flip the ends up some (so noone can see the light tab) and my supervisor would be none the wiser. Buuuut i work in a loud environment and the speakers isn't the greatest. Also the left speaker is noticeably quiter than the right speaker. This would make a great gift to someone who exercises, but the speaker volume isn't there yet for someone who works in a loud environment.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Connecting was easy
customer_reviews.text: The only con I can give you is that calling is atrocious on this but otherwise the sound part of it is acceptable I wouldn't say it's over the top but it's better than a lot of cheap headphones. And it's priced right around in there LOL.
customer_reviews.author: d.dkrivol

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my BF. He loves it and wears it all the time. Good sound and battery quility. He works in a factory setting and it gets really cold during the winters. Keeps his head warm and he is still able to listen to music/podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is pretty good for the price and comfort is as you expect a bean it with two little boxes in it to be but i did give this to a friend who enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: AudreyAnna Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: The placing of ear pieces are too far back. Maybe have the ability to adjust better. I bought these for my husband who loves to swear beanies especially during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tyler Moyes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it and works great for when I walk and run, but I do have some weird connectivity issues but it isn't too bad since it auto connects again works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rosendo Martinez-Lopez II

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for both my kids boys 14 and 10 for Christmas. They both love them. They are so easy to use, charge and wear. I have one kid who has yet to take it off his head. He now uses this instead of his earphones. Good sound quality and battery life. Have not attempted to wash yet.......
customer_reviews.author: SBrown

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap crap. Works but just like you think it would.
customer_reviews.author: boilerman

customer_reviews.title: Very giftable
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this beanie to a 18 y old boy and he loved it, he says it's more comfortable than using airpods. He lives in GA so it's perfect for the cold weather, although he likes to wear it at home too. He says this was the best gift he got from christmas this year. Very happy to hear that!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeGuido

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price, quality was exalent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 they loved them. The sound was fantastic, fit was great. They were Chistmass gifts, 4 different sizes all were perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband and he loves it. Cancels out background noise, comfy, and good sound quality. Currently the only hat he wears.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Harris

customer_reviews.title: Happy w/Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool to use, my son wears it from time to time, likes to have it around. He uses air pods most times, but he really enjoyed the beanie, cool tech item to use !
customer_reviews.author: Lizet Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not the warmest, but a great hat for discrete listening.
customer_reviews.text: Not the warmest hat, but great for discrete listening. Most people cannot tell the hat is Bluetooth. Battery lasts a fair amount of time. Sound quality is ok, not the best for music but good for podcasts and phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Never Expected To Love It So Much!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat not fully knowing what to expect but I am glad that I did! The sound quality is amazing and it is very warm. I haven't had the need to wash it yet. I bought this hat to wear for when I have to shovel snow. Great battery life as well!! So glad I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Moneek Small

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't want to take off!🤩
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for my 10 year old son and he absolutely loves this hat! It's soft, fits him well, and was easy to connect to his device. He enjoys the sound as well... friends are "jelly!"😁
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Simpson-Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well. Sound is loud and clear. It was for a gift but I set it up and checked it out as well. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for working outdoors. You can take the second speaker out if you work in an area where you need to be able to hear outside noises. I only wish it were available in more fashionable hat choices.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: He loved it, wore it skiing, and had a ball. Works well, sound is good. Price is really good if you compare to headphones
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, what you would expect for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't gotten a lot of use yet. Fit is nice. Quality seems okay. As pictured, the sound quality is what you would expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I can hear my music crystal clear and I have an IPhone. Sound quality is really good! Keeps my head warm too. Win win for me!
customer_reviews.author: SVPMARTIN2

customer_reviews.title: Must buy this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hat for my husband and he is absolutely IN LOVE with this hat! He never takes it off (almost literally) it doesn't make his head hot and the speakers are in a perfect spot. He said the thing that really sold the hat was the buttons on the side. You have the option to rewind with them! Color is great, and washing was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 19 year old kid who you are clueless what to buy for. He said he wished he had another one in more colors
customer_reviews.author: Amber Maddalena

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These beanies are so cool. You charge them and they sync up easily with your phone. The charge lasted all day while we were skiing and they are comfortable. Gave them as gifts and my kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter. Win!
customer_reviews.text: She can be picky. Either she is afraid to hurt my feelings, or she really likes this hat, because she has used it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Sounds OK
customer_reviews.text: Good for spoken dialogue and OK but not spectacular for music. The only concern is when playing Youtube videos on my cell phone, it will turn itself off on occasion when I start a video. It will also turns off when I'm re-positioning the speakers over my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Chow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking beanie, terrific sound, looks better slouched back so you don't see the square speakers at your ears
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reich

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wish I would of got one sooner. Great sound quality and no more ear pain from wearing earbuds. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The beanie is really small but the sound quality is really good
customer_reviews.text: So the one bad thing about this is that beanie is so tiny I ended up swapping the beanie out with one I already owned and just hid it in the flaps because it was large enough to wear I could hide all the wiring and such. Different sizes should be offered I have a big head so the size it came in was way to small for me
customer_reviews.author: EnzyGalicia

customer_reviews.title: Using it frequently
customer_reviews.text: I found out my daughter wasn't using it so I took it back and started using it myself. Works great while shoveling snow and doing winter yard word. Holds a decent charge too.
customer_reviews.author: HankTAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for an early Valentines present and he loves it. The sound on the speakers is really good and the hat is comfortable to wear and keeps you warm. He thought it was the best thing ever and had never seen anything like it. I was like the best thing since sliced bread to him and he used it to work on my car and loved that he could just wear the hat and work freely without having to use a speaker or earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Desere Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: One of several gifts I bought my son in law and he loved it so much, he tuned us out! I purchased a few....
customer_reviews.author: sir31

customer_reviews.title: Great Teen Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for that tween/teen kid who doesn’t know what they need! My 13 (almost 14 y/o) didn’t know Bluetooth beanies existed but he’s really enjoying them! Quality seems good and he compared the sound to his AirPods 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Courtnie B

customer_reviews.title: Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons.. one is a Postal Carrier the other works on electronics assembley.. They enjoy these
customer_reviews.author: conni reeve

customer_reviews.title: Run with it
customer_reviews.text: Great as a gift for an avid runner. He just loves being able to listen to music hands free while being outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Love my music
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for working outside. Get to listen to my music/podcasts when busy. Great value and design
customer_reviews.author: timothy Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for outside active wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He uses ear buds when he is running and the wires get caught in his jacket. I saw this and thought it would be perfect for him. He loves it and uses it every day. The only thing I would say I would say negative about this, it is on the large side (its a one size fits “most”). The built in microphone sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Lynn
